Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Is this Shome's destination?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Indeed. The private water park that Shome's grandfather built for himâ€”Venus Splash Park.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'Roland is standing beside Gabriel and looking around. The park facilities are old, but not dilapidated. Some service-type robots are aimlessly wandering around, giving the place an even lonelier air.'}
{3: 'Unchanged for decades, this small island is gradually sinking in a corner of the Caribbean Sea, frozen in time.'}
{3: 'At the moment of its completion, time became frozen on this enchanted isle. The observation platform, dreamily hanging in the sky, looks almost like a border between fantasy and reality.'}
{3: 'To spend time on this island, is to know solitude. A type of loneliness that dissects oneself from the world.'}
{3: 'The plethora of facilities planted in the various corners of the island have all become nothing but shards of the past, accumulating dust that is known as history.'}
{3: 'Venus Splash Park stands witness to the passing of time, alone, eternal, waiting quietly for its master to return.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Looks like this place never did open... But this place really is, how should I put it... quite, full of childish innocence?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Almost gives me an urge to... defile it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Well then. Let's begin.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'There is more to this water park than what meets the eye.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's voice rings out from behind the three Ascendants. The three salute upon seeing her, to which she dismisses briefly and begins assigning their missions."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "You will handle the energy center that is supporting the operation of the theme park. It's likely that Shome's purpose in coming here is hidden there.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Roland, I leave setting traps in the theme park to you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "No worries. I'll make sure this game goes smoothly.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After giving Gabriel and Roland instructions, Luna tilts her head at the huge observation platform in the sky.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lamia, can I leave the air to you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I... I-I will try my best, Miss Luna.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Good. Our operation this time will definitely alert the surrounding factions, but they must not impede our plans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "This is the Shome's final resting place, where he will wake from his dream.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Let his damnation, and this place's, be a wake-up call for those who do not comply.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory188.png'}
{3: 'After assigning the Ascendants their missions, Luna heads into the depths of the theme park.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Getting Shome to play out his hand here, plucking it out one by one... Miss Luna sure is a mean one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Oh right, I think I saw an elevator over there that leads to the observation platform.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Don't forget the mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Yeah... I can control the flow of the surrounding virus when I'm up there.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Then I shall take my leave. I've just finished scanning the energy center below.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "It's larger than I'd expected.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "But, well, not like it'd be any trouble for you.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'True. We can easily modify a machine facility of this scale thanks to what we found in Kowloong. Turning it into a dead zone, as the humans call it, would only require half an hour.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "...Um. Actually, on my way here, I've already raised the viral density around the island as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "It won't take long for the Corrupted to rise out of the sea and attack the shores.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Tis more meaningful than twiddling our thumbs.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Hey, hey, was that meant to be a slight? I'll have you know, I've been seriously ruminating on how to prepare the stage.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...Or something like that.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Hmph. I'll leave the surface to you then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Got it. Go, go, down you go.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gabriel turns and marches towards the underground energy center. Roland waves his hands impatiently and strolls inside of the theme park.'}
